summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WhatsApp monitoring platform. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI working correctly with minor QR modal display issue.

ui_bugs.issue: QR code image not immediately visible when modal opens
ui_bugs.details: Modal opens but QR image takes time to load or may not be visible immediately

design_issues.issue: Dark theme class not detected on HTML element
design_issues.details: App appears to be in dark mode visually but dark class not found on html element

passed_tests: Account CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Account card display with correct status badges
All data-testid attributes present and functional
Design guidelines compliance (dark theme, spacing, colors)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Ensure QR code image loads immediately when QR modal opens. Consider adding loading state or checking image src attribute.
